item.title: The I.R.S. Tried to Stop This Tax Dodge. Scott Bessent Used It Anyway.
item.description: Like many on Wall Street, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent used a limited partnership to avoid Medicare taxes. Unlike the others, he’s now overseeing ...

item.title: China’s Green Triumph
item.description: China is equipping other countries to fight climate change. It’s a role reversal.

item.title: Atlanta Fed President to Step Down in February
item.description: The departure of Raphael W. Bostic, who has served in the role since 2017, would create a new vacancy at the central bank.

item.title: Jack Schlossberg, Scion of the Kennedy Family, Gives Politics a Try
item.description: As he prepares a congressional run, J.F.K.’s grandson admits, “I’m not for everybody.”
